::Battera::

She looked down and sighed. "Oh. I've been trying to find the leader 
for some time now.  I'm supposed to talk to them to try to get them 
to come to the peace talks.  I know it's kind of strange to have a 
predacon like me talk of peace like this.  But I have to try.  These 
peace talks may be the only way of ending the war. At least I hope 
they end the war."  She was starting to get discouraged.  She had 
been there for so long and had yet to even meet with the leader.
"Oh well, I'll just have to wait a little longer I guess."  She 
turned and leaned up against the wall with her head still hung down.

She had been on the maximal ship so long, she wondered if she was 
becoming a maximal herself.  She wrapped her wings around her body 
and tried to think.

She turned her head and looked at Kluster.  "Who is the leader then 
if your not hte leader of the maximals?" It struck her that no one 
had even told her who was in charge yet.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster shakes his head. "I'm the commander of the ship, not of the 
> Maximals," he replies to Battera, "The Maximal Commander is 
somewhere else."
